rows.label: qst200205_msg0003
rows.name:
All this griping isn't going to solve
anything. Tell us what happened!

rows.label: qst200205_msg0004
rows.name:
That look in your eyes...there's a
fierce passion behind it. Reminds
me of Harghal, actually...

rows.label: qst200205_msg0005
rows.name:
I loved dancing since I was a little girl.
That's why I came to Avaritia to
make my fortune as a dancer.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0006
rows.name:
I hit it off with Harghal right away,
because we both had the same dream.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0007
rows.name: So you really were best friends.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0008
rows.name:
Sure we were. We were practically
inseparable. I told her everything.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0009
rows.name:
But her talent was the real deal,
and I...just couldn't compare.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0010
rows.name:
While she was shining like a star on the
stage, I was just lurking in her shadow.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0037
rows.name:
She got all the attention from Bahn,
while I was just a tagalong.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0011
rows.name:
Naturally, when Bahn took a liking
to you, it meant you got better pay.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0012
rows.name:
She got the best of everything,
and I wasn't too bad off either.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0013
rows.name:
But then there was that huge scandal,
and Bahn was ruined.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0014
rows.name:
After that, I couldn't support myself
with dancing alone. I had to take up
jobs at canteens and bars on the side.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0015
rows.name:
But even so, I was satisfied.
Because I was still dancing, still
living the life I'd dreamed of.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0016
rows.name:
It wasn't a glamorous or an easy life,
but as long as I had my dancing and
a friend like Harghal, I was still happy.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0017
rows.name:
But as it turned out...
Harghal didn't feel the same way.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0018
rows.name:
It wasn't long before she got sick of
our new situation. She said she'd had
enough of dancing, and left Avaritia.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0019
rows.name: What was Harghal so dissatisfied by?

rows.label: qst200205_msg0020
rows.name:
No point asking me.
I gave up thinking about her
a long time ago.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0021
rows.name:
Then do you at least have some
idea where she might have gone?
We need to find her.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0022
rows.name:
She said she was going back to live
with her family in Alba Margen.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0023
rows.name:
In Superbia... I guess we'll have
to ask around there next.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0024
rows.name: Tell me one thing, Couche.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0025
rows.name:
You haven't given up dancing,
have you?

rows.label: qst200205_msg0026
rows.name: Not just yet.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0027
rows.name:
I believe your passion for dancing
and the friendship you shared are
both strong and enduring.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0028
rows.name:
So if Harghal comes back someday,
could you find it in your heart to
welcome her?

rows.label: qst200205_msg0029
rows.name:
...You know, talking to you has given
me a bit of perspective on things.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0030
rows.name:
I get part of me does still wish I could
go back to dancing with her.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0031
rows.name:
So...all right.
I'll give her one more chance.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0032
rows.name:
Now that's the kind of friendship
I like to see!

rows.label: qst200205_msg0033
rows.name: Hahah... Good luck convincing her.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0034
rows.name:
If she still cares about dancing at all,
you bring her back here.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0035
rows.name:
Harghal was an incredible dancer -
everyone's darling, Bahn's favorite.

rows.label: qst200205_msg0036
rows.name:
And then she betrayed me and just left!
I couldn't care less about that skank!
